directions: In a bowl whisk together the mustard, the sour cream, the tarragon, the scallion, and pepper to taste, add the Swiss cheese and the walnuts, and combine the mixture well. Serve the mixture with the crackers.
ingredients: 2 1/2 cups coarsely grated Swiss cheese (about 1/2 pound)
1/2 cup chopped walnuts, toasted lightly and cooled
title: Swiss Cheese with Walnuts and Mustard
